keyMoments.description: Flashback shows the first time Chopper's Devil Fruit powers were enhanced by the Rumble Ball, causing unexpected transformations when he accidentally ate the experimental medicine
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the moment when Chopper discovered that his Devil Fruit abilities could be manipulated chemically, leading to the development of his signature combat style

keyMoments.description: Chopper uses a Rumble Ball transformation in the present while confronting Robin, though his attack misses and breaks a water barrel instead
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's continued reliance on the Rumble Ball for enhanced forms, though in a comedic rather than serious combat context

abilities.name: Rumble Ball Enhanced Transformations
abilities.description: The Rumble Ball distorts the wavelength of Chopper's Devil Fruit, enabling additional transformation forms beyond his three natural Zoan forms

keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Hana Hana no Mi powers to sprout arms that tickle Chopper, demonstrating a playful and non-threatening use of her abilities
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's gentle nature and peaceful intentions toward the crew, using her potentially dangerous powers for harmless fun rather than combat or assassination

abilities.name: Playful Application
abilities.description: Robin demonstrates using her power to sprout arms for tickling rather than combat, showing the versatility of her ability beyond fighting
